summary.span: 对与安全系统交互的类提供主访问点。

span.span: Provides the main access point for classes interacting with the security system.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全提供访问和操作安全策略配置的方法。Security provides methods to access and manipulate the security policy configuration. 不能创建的实例 。You cannot create instances of .

.property bool CheckExecutionRights
Public Shared Property CheckExecutionRights As Boolean
public: static property bool CheckExecutionRights { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CheckExecutionRights : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Because execution permission checks can no longer be turned off, the CheckExecutionRights property no longer has any effect.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Because execution permission checks can no longer be turned off, the CheckExecutionRights property no longer has any effect.")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示代码是否必须具有 才能执行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code must have in order to execute.

value.span: 如果代码必须具有 才能执行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if code must have in order to execute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为 `false` ，甚至不 能执行代码。If this property is `false`, even code without can execute. 执行检查非常昂贵，并且可以消除延迟策略解析的优点。Execution checking is expensive and can eliminate the advantages of lazy policy resolution. 提供此属性是为了在需要时禁用执行检查。This property is provided to disable execution checking when needed. 在调用之前，不会保留对此属性的更改 。A change to this property is not persisted until is called. 新进程将不会受更改的影响，直到将其保存在注册表中。New processes will not be affected by the change until it is persisted in the registry.

exception.span: 调用此方法的代码不含 。

span.span: The code that calls this method does not have .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture ();
.method public static hidebysig bool CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture() cil managed
Public Shared Function CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture () As Boolean
public: static bool CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture();
static member CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture : unit -> bool

summary.span: 确定在必须在稍后的某个时间点重新创建当前线程的安全状态的情况下，当前线程是否需要安全上下文捕获。

span.span: Determines whether the current thread requires a security context capture if its security state has to be re-created at a later point in time.

returns.span: 如果堆栈不包含部分信任的应用程序域、部分信任的程序集以及当前活动的 或 修饰符，则为 ；如果公共语言运行时无法保证堆栈不包含其中任一项，则为 。

span.span: if the stack contains no partially trusted application domains, no partially trusted assemblies, and no currently active or modifiers; if the common language runtime cannot guarantee that the stack contains none of these.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用 方法来缓存在安全要求成功后获取的敏感数据。You can use the method before you cache sensitive data that is obtained after successful security demands. 如果 堆栈上的方法调用得更高，则不应在不捕获相应安全上下文的情况下缓存数据。If the method has been called higher on the stack, the data should not be cached without capturing the corresponding security context. 否则，在中获取的敏感数据 可能会变得可供不再用该位置运行的代码使用 。Otherwise, sensitive data that is obtained under an may become available to code that is no longer be running with that in place. > [!IMPORTANT] > 仅当返回值为时，返回值才是可靠的 `false` ，这意味着保证该线程不需要安全上下文捕获。The return value is reliable only when it is `false`, which means that the thread is guaranteed not to require a security context capture. 当不需要安全上下文捕获时，此方法可能会返回 true，以避免安全漏洞。The method may return true when a security context capture is not necessary, to avoid security vulnerabilities. 是安全关键的，因为它的主要用途是避免不必要的安全上下文捕获，这表示使用它的代码是安全敏感的，必须经过审核。 is security-critical because its main use is to avoid unnecessary security context captures, which indicates that the code using it is security-sensitive and must be audited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.PermissionSet GetStandardSandbox (System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.PermissionSet GetStandardSandbox(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetStandardSandbox (evidence As Evidence) As PermissionSet
public: static System::Security::PermissionSet ^ GetStandardSandbox(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ evidence);
static member GetStandardSandbox : System.Security.Policy.Evidence -> System.Security.PermissionSet

param.name: evidence
param.span: 要与某个权限集匹配的主机证据。

span.span: The host evidence to match to a permission set.

summary.span: 获取一个权限集，对具有提供的证据的应用程序授予此权限集是安全的。

span.span: Gets a permission set that is safe to grant to an application that has the provided evidence.

returns.span: 一个权限集，它可用作具有提供的证据的应用程序的权限集。

span.span: A permission set that can be used as a grant set for the application that has the provided evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，中的主机证据 `evidence` 必须包含 证据。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the host evidence in `evidence` must contain evidence. > > 下表显示了为每个区域返回的权限集。The following table shows the permission sets that are returned for each zone. |区域Zone|权限集Permission set| |----------|--------------------| ||`FullTrust`| ||`LocalIntranet`| ||`Internet`| ||`Internet`| ||无None| ||无None| 可以考虑其他证据，如 或 。Other evidence, such as or , may be considered. 沙盒可以使用返回的权限集来运行应用程序。The returned permission set can be used by a sandbox to run the application. 请注意，此方法不指定策略，但会帮助主机确定应用程序请求的权限集是否合理。Note that this method does not specify policy, but helps a host to determine whether the permission set requested by an application is reasonable. 此方法可用于将区域映射到沙盒。This method can be used to map a zone to a sandbox. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法获取沙盒应用程序的权限集。The following example shows how to use the method to obtain the permission set for a sandboxed application. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox)。For more information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox). [!code-csharp[sandboxingApis#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SandboxingAPIs/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sandboxingApis#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SandboxingAPIs/VB/program.vb#1)]

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: is .

param.name: zone
param.span: 一个输出参数，它包含已授予的 对象的 。

span.span: An output parameter that contains an of granted objects.

param.name: origin
param.span: 一个输出参数，它包含已授予的 对象的 。

span.span: An output parameter that contains an of granted objects.

summary.span: 获取当前程序集的已授予的区域标识和 URL 标识权限集。

span.span: Gets the granted zone identity and URL identity permission sets for the current assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的建议替代方法是使用执行程序集的 URL 和区域证据来调用 每个证据类型。The recommended alternative to this method is to use the URL and Zone evidence for the executing assembly to call for each evidence type. 从调用返回的权限集根据 其区域和源 URL 标识授予执行程序集的权限。The permission sets returned from the calls identify the permissions granted to the executing assembly based on its zone and URL of origin. > [!NOTE] > 此成员对 ECMA 公钥发出链接要求，此请求不是有效的加密密钥，而是一个伪密钥。This member makes a link demand for the ECMA public key, which is not a valid cryptographic key but a pseudo key. 在 .NET Framework 会自动将 ECMA 伪密钥的链接要求转换为 Microsoft 公钥的链接要求。Within the .NET Framework the link demand for the ECMA pseudo key is automatically converted to a link demand for the Microsoft public key. 安全异常基于 Microsoft 公钥，而不是 ECMA 伪密钥。The security exception is based on the Microsoft public key, not the ECMA pseudo key.

exception.span: 对 的请求失败。

span.span: The request for failed.

span.span: Determines whether a permission is granted to the caller.

span.span: if the permissions granted to the caller include the permission ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的授予由策略决定，并且不同于要求使用者（如断言）。Granting of permissions is determined by policy and is different from a demand subject to overrides, such as an assert. 此外， 仅测试调用代码程序集的授予，与堆栈上的其他调用方无关。Also, only tests the grant of the calling code assembly, independent of other callers on the stack.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")]
[<System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")>]

summary.span: 提供一个枚举器，以按等级访问安全策略层次结构，例如计算机策略和用户策略。

span.span: Provides an enumerator to access the security policy hierarchy by levels, such as computer policy and user policy.

returns.span: 构成安全策略层次结构的 对象的枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator for objects that compose the security policy hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的枚举器提供连续的 对象，这些对象代表层次结构中各自 (计算机、用户、企业、应用程序域) 级别的策略。The returned enumerator provides successive objects that represent the policy at the respective (machine, user, enterprise, application domain) level of the hierarchy. 这些对象为实时策略对象;更改这些对象可能会产生不可预知的结果。These objects are the live policy objects; altering these objects can have unpredictable results. 最小策略层次结构包括计算机级别、企业级别和用户级别。Minimum policy hierarchy consists of a machine level, an enterprise level, and a user level. 但是，层次结构可以包含其他级别。However, the hierarchy can include additional levels.

exception.span: 此方法使用代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略，该策略在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已过时。

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: 若要使 CAS 策略与 .NET Framework 早期版本的兼容性，请使用[ < c y > 元素](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element)。

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element).

exception.span: 调用此方法的代码不含 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用安全策略引擎，并为其提供调用代码标识的证据。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with evidence of the calling code's identity. 结果由安全策略确定。The result is determined by the security policy.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")]
[<System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")>]

param.name: evidences
param.span: 用于评估策略的证据对象的数组。

span.span: An array of evidence objects used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: 根据指定的证据确定向代码授予什么权限。

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

returns.span: 适用于所有提供的证据的权限集。

span.span: The set of permissions that is appropriate for all of the provided evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用安全策略引擎，并为其提供一个对象数组 。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with an array of objects. 返回的权限集只表示那些应用到数组中的每个证据的权限。The returned permission set represents only those permissions that apply to every evidence in the array. 这些权限可以是等效于的权限，也可以是策略授予每个单个证据的权限的子集。These permissions are either equivalent to, or a subset of the permissions that policy would have granted to each individual evidence. 此方法的行为就像您对数组中的每个对象上的 "解析策略" 的结果执行了交集 。This method behaves as if you were performing an intersection on the results of resolving policy on each of the objects in the array.

exception.span: 此方法使用代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略，该策略在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已过时。

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: 若要使 CAS 策略与 .NET Framework 早期版本的兼容性，请使用[ < c y > 元素](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element)。

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element).

span.span: An output parameter that contains the set of permissions not granted.

summary.span: 根据指定的证据和请求确定向代码授予什么权限。

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence and requests.

returns.span: 可由安全系统授予的一组权限。

span.span: The set of permissions that would be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用安全策略引擎，并为其提供调用代码标识的证据和代码所请求的权限集。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with evidence of the calling code's identity and the set of permissions the code requests. 结果由安全策略确定。The result is determined by the security policy. 此方法返回安全系统将授予的权限集，并返回将被拒绝为输出参数的权限集。This method returns the set of permissions that would be granted by the security system, and returns the set of permissions that would be denied as an output parameter. 有效授予的权限是不在拒绝集内的已授予集中的权限。The effective granted permissions are those in the granted set that are not in the denied set.

exception.span: 此方法使用代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略，该策略在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已过时。

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: 若要使 CAS 策略与 .NET Framework 早期版本的兼容性，请使用[ < c y > 元素](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element)。

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element).

exception.span: 策略无法授予 参数指定的所需最小权限。

span.span: Policy fails to grant the minimum required permissions specified by the parameter.

span.span: The evidence set against which the policy is evaluated.

summary.span: 获取与指定证据相匹配的代码组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of code groups matching the specified evidence.

returns.span: 与证据匹配的代码组集的枚举。

span.span: An enumeration of the set of code groups matching the evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在分析指定的策略配置如何与特定类型的证据一起工作时很有用。This method is useful in analyzing how a specified policy configuration works with specific kinds of evidence. 将从与参数匹配的策略层次结构的所有适用级别返回代码组 `evidence` 。Code groups will be returned from all applicable levels of the policy hierarchy matching the `evidence` parameter.

exception.span: 此方法使用代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略，该策略在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已过时。

span.span: Determines which permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence, excluding the policy for the level.

returns.span: 可由安全系统授予的一组权限。

span.span: The set of permissions that can be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用安全策略引擎，并为其提供调用代码标识的证据。This method invokes the security policy engine and provides it with evidence of the calling code's identity. 结果取决于任何策略的 "系统安全策略" 。The result is determined by the system security policy exclusive of any policy.

summary.span: 保存修改的安全策略状态。

span.span: Saves the modified security policy state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将策略保存为由 、 和表示安全策略配置的其他类公开。This method saves the policy as exposed by , , and other classes that represent configuration of the security policy. 除非调用此方法，否则不会保存对策略对象所做的更改，并且不会影响后续的应用程序运行。Unless this method is called, changes made to the policy objects will not be saved and will not affect subsequent application runs.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Because security can no longer be turned off permanently, setting the SecurityEnabled property no longer has any effect. Reading the property will still indicate whether security has been turned off temporarily.")]

[<System.Obsolete("Because security can no longer be turned off permanently, setting the SecurityEnabled property no longer has any effect. Reading the property will still indicate whether security has been turned off temporarily.")>]
[System.Obsolete("Because security can no longer be turned off, the SecurityEnabled property no longer has any effect.")]
[<System.Obsolete("Because security can no longer be turned off, the SecurityEnabled property no longer has any effect.")>]
[System.Obsolete("The security manager cannot be turned off on MS runtime")]
[<System.Obsolete("The security manager cannot be turned off on MS runtime")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否启用安全的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether security is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了安全，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if security is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Caspol.exe (代码访问安全策略工具](/dotnet/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool)使用此属性) This property is used by the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool) `-security` (`-s`) 选项关闭基于代码的安全性。`-security` (`-s`) option to turn off code-based security. 为管理员提供了禁用代码访问安全性的方法。 provides a way for administrators to disable code access security. 当禁用代码访问安全性时，所有代码访问要求都会成功。When code access security is disabled, all code access demands succeed. 实际上，这将授予所有代码 `FullTrust` 。Effectively, this grants all code `FullTrust`. 禁用代码访问安全性会绕过安全系统，使得代码的执行效果可能略微低于授予所有代码的等效安全策略 `FullTrust` 。Disabling code access security bypasses the security system so that code might perform slightly better than the equivalent security policy granting `FullTrust` to all code. 此属性不会禁用基于角色的安全性;因此， 请求不受影响。This property does not disable role-based security; therefore, demands are not affected. > [!CAUTION] > 禁用代码访问安全性会使系统容易受到恶意代码（如病毒和蠕虫）的攻击。Disabling code access security makes the system vulnerable to attacks by malicious code such as viruses and worms. 禁用代码访问安全性不会以任何方式自动阻止托管代码运行。Disabling code access security does not automatically block managed code from running in any way. 它仅在代码访问安全系统不受限制的情况下运行托管代码，因此，只应特别小心。It only causes managed code to run without restriction by the code access security system, and should only be done with the most extreme caution. 只有在采取了其他安全措施来帮助保护系统安全时，才可以关闭安全性以获得更高的性能。Turning off security to gain extra performance should only be done when other security measures have been taken to help protect system security. 其他的安全防范措施包括与公共网络断开连接、从物理上保证计算机的安全等等。Examples of other security precautions include disconnecting from public networks, physically securing computers, and so on. 在调用之前，对此属性的更改不会保存在注册表中 。A change to this property is not persisted in the registry until is called. 新进程将不会受更改的影响，直到将其保存在注册表中。New processes will not be affected by the change until it is persisted in the registry. 更改正在运行的进程中的此属性的值不一定会按预期方式更改状态。Changing the value of this property in a running process does not necessarily change the state in the expected manner. 若要确保更改生效，您必须调用 并启动一个新进程。To ensure changes have taken effect, you must call and start a new process.

exception.span: 调用此方法的代码不含 。
